application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Conditions 11 (Sound insulation), 15 (Contamination - preliminary risk assessment report  and proposed site investigation), 16 (Contamination - Quantitative risk assessment and remediation strategy) and 19 (Flood Risk Assessment and Sustainable Drainage Systems Strategy) of planning permission PP/24/03995 (Internal refurbishment and reconfiguration works including a new lift and extension to fourth floor plus associated alterations at 51 Cadogan Square; construction of single storey basement extension, installation of 2no. new rooflights and modification to the mansard roof at 150 Pavilion Road with associated fenestration works)
